name: PKToolPickerObserver
desc: An interface you use to detect when the user changes the selected tools and drawing characteristics of a tool picker object.

items.name: func toolPickerSelectedToolDidChange(PKToolPicker)
items.desc: Tells the observer that the user selected a new tool.

items.name: func toolPickerIsRulerActiveDidChange(PKToolPicker)
items.desc: Tells the observer that the user showed or hid the ruler.

items.name: func toolPickerVisibilityDidChange(PKToolPicker)
items.desc: Tells the observer that the user showed or hid the tool picker.

items.name: func toolPickerFramesObscuredDidChange(PKToolPicker)
items.desc: Tells the observer that area obscured by the tool picker changed.
